mapper.select: select * from wx_posts p, wx_users u where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.id = p.userid
select * from wx_posts p, wx_users u where u.id = p.userid
mapper.insert:
insert into wx_posts
id,
userid,
title,
content,
status,
flags,
class,
begintime,
endtime,

update wx_posts
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flags = #{flags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
